description: This algorithm performs batch effect and cohort effect correction on intensity data using a statistical modeling approach based on linear mixed models (LMM). This tool is especially suited for omics or high-throughput datasets, where batch or injection order can introduce unwanted variability.
keywords: metabolomics; quality control; statistics;batch effect;large-scale;study effect
name: PARSEC
